meanings.definition: The quality or state of being exaggerated.
meanings.sent1: Her story had an exaggeratednesses that made it hard to believe.
meanings.sent2: The exaggeratednesses of his claims made everyone skeptical.
meanings.sent3: The exaggeratednesses of his fishing tale made us all chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The exaggeratednesses of the storm's fury was like a roaring lion.
meanings.sent5: The exaggeratednesses of her laughter echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: The tendency to overstate or overemphasize something.
meanings.sent1: His constant exaggeratednesses in conversations made him seem insincere.
meanings.sent2: The politician's exaggeratednesses in his speeches were evident to all.
meanings.sent3: The exaggeratednesses of her excuses for being late were always amusing.
meanings.sent4: The exaggeratednesses of his promises were like castles in the air.
meanings.sent5: The exaggeratednesses of his fear of spiders was comical to everyone.
